Automata

Synopsis

  • newtype DTransition q a = DTransition (Map (q, a) q)
  • newtype NTransitionE q a = NTransitionE (Map (q, Maybe a) (Set q))
  • newtype NTransition q a = NTransition (Map (q, a) (Set q))
  • newtype ATransition q a = ATransition (Map (q, a) (BasicPropLogic q))
  • data FA q a t = FA {
    • alphabet :: Set a
    • states :: Set q
    • init :: q
    • transition :: t q a
    • final :: Set q
    }
  • type DFA q a = FA q a DTransition
  • type NFAE q a = FA q a NTransitionE
  • type NFA q a = FA q a NTransition
  • type AFA q a = FA q a ATransition
  • isFinal :: Ord q => q -> Set q -> Bool
  • d2nE :: (Eq a, Ord q) => DFA q a -> NFAE q a
  • d2n :: Ord q => DFA q a -> NFA q a
  • n2a :: (Eq a, Ord q) => NFA q a -> AFA q a
  • bigOr :: (Ord p, Ord u, Ord b) => Set p -> PropLogic p u b
  • nE2n :: NFAE q a -> NFA q a
  • n2d :: (Ord a, Ord q) => NFA q a -> DFA (Set q) a
  • post :: (Ord a, Ord q) => Set q -> Map (q, a) (Set r) -> a -> Set r
  • subsets :: Ord a => Set a -> Set (Set a)
  • a2n :: (Ord a, Ord q) => AFA q a -> NFA (Set q) a
  • minSat :: forall q. Ord q => Set q -> (Set q -> Bool) -> Set (Set q)
  • ldl2afa :: LDLogic p -> AFA (LDLogic p) (Set p)
  • dfaEmpty :: DFA q a -> Bool

data FA q a t Source

the general type of a finite automaton.

Constructors

FA

states :: Set q

just one starting state.
